mapper.insert: insert into sell (userid, writer, title, price, content, filename, filepath, code) values (#{userid}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{price}, #{content}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code})
mapper.select: select count(*) from sell where code=#{code}

sql.if: and userid in ( select userid from member2 where writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
and ( title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or userid in ( select userid from member2 where writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) )

mapper.insert: insert into sell_comment(content, userid, pid) values(#{content}, #{userid}, #{pid})
mapper.select: select c.*, (select writer from member2 where userid=c.userid) writer, to_char(writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') writedate from sell_comment c where pid=#{pid} order by id desc
mapper.update: update sell_comment set content=#{content} where id=#{id}
update sell set readcnt = readcnt+1 where id=#{id}
